creator: Akhir Pekan Studio
descriptionHtml:
Are you ready to own the world's best laundry store? Transform a small laundry shop into a laundry empire!

Discover the following features in Laundry Store Simulator:
♦ Laundry Store: Wash and dry your way to success! Design the perfect laundry store, place your machines strategically, and keep customers coming back.
♦ Upgrade: Upgrade your equipment to provide exceptional cleaning services! Invest in high-quality washing machines, dryers, ironing equipment, and even automated washing machines!
♦ Design: Create a stylish and inviting space to attract customers! Provide comfortable seating, warm decorations, and more funsies to welcome your customers!
♦ Expand: Grow your laundry business by unlocking new areas and features, offering complimentary services to attract more customers!
♦ Hire Staff: Build a dedicated team to manage your laundry store efficiently! Hire qualified and experienced staff laundry attendants, such as, washers, dryers, and more!
♦ Sell Items : Boost your profits by selling cleaning supplies and becoming a one-stop shop for laundry needs! Offer a variety of cleaning products, including detergents, fabric softeners, stain removers, and more!
♦ Delivery: Offer convenient home delivery to build a loyal customer base! Optimize delivery routes for efficiency and cost-effectiveness and provide excellent customer service during the delivery process!

We cherish your journey through our game!
Your thoughts, experiences, and any challenges you face are truly valued. Please share your story with us at cs+laundry@akhirpekan.studio!

Discover more heartwarming adventures in our other games:
https://linktr.ee/akhirpekanstudio
descriptionShort: Build the most successful laundry store in the world!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Laundry Sign is now customizable!
- New premium feature: Skydancer Balloon! Place this in front of your Laundry Store to attract more customers!
- Fixed miscellanous bugs

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Maximum Laundry Rank increased to 5!
- New Feature: Vending Machine! Sell drinks to waiting customers and increase your profit!
- New employee for your Bakso Cart!
- New employee to clean your floors!
- New store: Paint Shop! Buy paint cans to color your floor and walls!
- New premium feature: Customers Pack! Welcome 5 special customers into your Laundry Store!
- Added light switch to control lightning

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Maximum Laundry Rank increased to 6!
- New Feature: Shoe Cleaning! Polish customers' footwear to increase your proft!
- New employee: Restocker
- Bakso Man and Robot Cleaner gets a special upgrade
- Washer and Dryer's special upgrade now also delivers the basket to the delivery guy's bike
- New premium feature: Mechanical Horse! This magical horse generates Golden Tickets!
- New items
- New room
